name: Mans Best Friend (hugh-man)
description:
Make your way through a freezing landscape with your doggo companion!

Sneak by enemies!
Throw rocks!
Stay warm and don't freeze!
Collect Journal scraps & Thermoses!

Find your way through dangerous territory, and follow the bonfires!

Note: this is a very unpolished game. it mostly showcases my ability to program a game from scratch using Unity.
